clinical_study.brief_title: Benefits of Using a Transparent Visor to Replace the Face Mask in Speech Therapy Rehabilitation of Oral-Linguo-Facial Praxies in the Context of COVID-19: a Series of Cases
clinical_study.official_title: Benefits of Using a Transparent Visor to Replace the Face Mask in Speech Therapy Rehabilitation of Oral-Linguo-Facial Praxies in the Context of COVID-19: a Series of Cases

brief_summary.textblock: The primary objective of the study is to compare the effectiveness of the use of a transparent covering visor with that of the face mask, with or without the use of video sequences, for speech therapy rehabilitation of oral-linguo-facial praxies in the context of the COVID 19 epidemic.

detailed_description.textblock: Statistic analysis: single case experimental design (SCED) method.

primary_outcome.time_frame: throughtout of the study, an average of 2 weeks

study_pop.textblock: 4 patients hospitalized in the adult neurological Post Intensive Care Rehabilitation Unit (PICRU - SRPR) of Raymond Poincaré hospital.
